deposit-using-agreements-p1: Bonus is additional funds that are provided by the company to increase the trading potential of traders.
deposit-using-agreements-p2: When making a deposit, a certain amount of bonus money may be credited to your account, size of bonus depends on the size of your deposit.
deposit-using-agreements-p3: The bonus does not limit the amount of funds that you can withdraw: you can withdraw your profits together with the amount of your deposit at any time. Please note that when withdrawing funds, all unearned bonus funds will be assigned inactive status and will be debited from your account.
deposit-user-sum-value-caption: Want to pick up you own amount? Use the input field
cashbox-withdrawal-info-0-header: How can I withdraw funds from my account?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-0-content: Available options are: bank card, Qiwi/Yandex Money/WebMoney e-wallets. Owners of micro accounts can have only one active application for withdrawal of funds.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-1-header: What is the minimum amount of money that can be withdrawn from the account?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-1-content: Minimum withdrawal amount — ₽300 or $5 or €5 or ₴150. Maximum withdrawal amount for a single transaction — ₽15,000 or $200 or €200 or ₴6,000.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-2-header: How do I withdraw an amount that is greater than ₽15,000 or $200 or €200, or ₴6,000?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-2-content: This restriction has been set to prevent rapid account withdrawals. Amounts that exceed the established limit may only be withdrawn over the longer period of time. If you need to withdraw a greater amount, you can split your funds withdrawals into ₽15,000 or $200 or €200 or ₴6,000 increments. You are not limited in the number of withdrawal requests that you can make. If you would like to make a larger withdrawal in a single payment, then please contact the platform support team. If your account is not verified, then it may take up to three business days to process your funds withdrawal request. You may not submit more than one funds withdrawal request per day.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-header: How's quick the withdrawal of funds?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-content-a: It takes one hour to process a request, assuming that the request is submitted during the business hours of the platform finance department and your account has been verified in accordance with the platform requirements.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-content-b: The business hours of the finance department are Monday through Friday 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM (GMT +2). If you submit a funds withdrawal request outside of the business hours of the finance department or on a holiday, then your request will be processed at the beginning of the next business day. If your account is unverified, then your funds withdrawal request will be processed within three business days. You may not submit more than one funds withdrawal request per day.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-4-content-a: The client must indicate all of the requested data in the "Profile Settings" section in order to ensure that their request is duly processed. If it is determined that inaccurate or incomplete data was entered, your funds withdrawal request may be rejected or delayed.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-4-content-b: Funds are withdrawn to the same bank account (or the same payment system) that was used to fund your account. If it is not possible to complete the transaction, then you should contact the support service by either initiating an online chat or sending a support request to support@binarium.com.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-header: Do I need to provide documents when I withdraw funds? If I do, then which ones?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-content-a: Please provide all of your personal data in the "Profile Settings" section in order to ensure rapid withdrawals. If you use several bank cards or the payment details do not match the ones that you provided during registration, you will need to undergo a full authorization process and prove that the cards actually belong to you. Funds may not be withdrawn to third-party accounts.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-content-b: To complete the verification process, please send a scan of your passport and the front side of your bank card to support@binarium.com so that the first and last names of the owner can be seen. If you own not an embossed card, then you must send a scan of your bank statement displaying a transaction from this card to your Binarium account in addition to the copy of your passport. The company reserves the right to require additional supporting documents if the cardholder and trading account data do not match.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-header: On what conditions is it possible to withdraw bonus funds?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-a: The bonus itself may not be withdrawn immediately after it has been accrued. The broker credits this money to your account as a bonus to increase your trading opportunities. The interest that you earn using the bonus funds also constitutes a bonus, and it is available for withdrawal only after the necessary trade turnover is achieved. In order to withdraw the bonus itself, you need to achieve a x40 turnover of the bonus amount in the account. If you were given a no deposit bonus, then the leverage is increased to 50, that is, the turnover on the account should be equal to the bonus x50 and the maximum withdrawal amount may not exceed the amount of the no deposit bonus that has been added. Cash prizes that are won in the company's free contests are considered bonuses that are only available for withdrawal after achieving a x40 turnover.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-b: Example. When you made a deposit, you accrued $150 as a bonus. According to the rules, you need to achieve a total value of purchased options of 30 x 150 = $4,500. After this value is achieved, you can withdraw the bonus funds. In this case, both profitable and unprofitable transactions are taken into account. Prematurely terminated transactions are not included in the turnover. There are no restrictions on the withdrawal of profits.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-c: If you are going to withdraw the part of the deposit, then the bonus is automatically deducted from your account.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-d: If you have any questions, then please contact the Binarium support service.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-7-header: I am not able to create a funds withdrawal request for my account. What could be wrong?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-7-content: First, check whether all of your personal information is listed on your profile page in the "Profile" section. Once again, make sure that you entered all the information correctly at the time that you submit your request. Special characters like +, -, / etc are invalid. If all of the entered information is correct, but the problem persists, please contact our customer support service via online chat or at support@binarium.com.
deposit-info-1: Bonus is additional funds that are provided by the company to increase the trading potential of traders
deposit-info-2: When making a deposit, a certain amount of bonus money may be credited to your account, size of bonus depends on the size of your deposit.
deposit-info-3: The bonus does not limit the amount of funds that you can withdraw: you can withdraw your profits at any time as well as the amount of your deposit. Please note that when withdrawing funds, all bonus funds that were not used in trades with a x40 turnover will be assigned inactive status and will be debited from your account.
withdrawal-heading: Your request will be processed within 24 hours from the time when you submit it.
withdrawal-content: If the application was issued outside the working hours of company’s financial department, it will be processed within the next working day.
withdrawal-restricted-heading: Funds withdrawal request limit is exceeded
withdrawal-restricted-content: Unfortunately, we cannot accept more than five requests per day. To submit a new request, cancel the requests that you previously submitted or try again in 24 hours
withdrawal-request-sent: The request is placed in the queue
withdrawal-request-sent-extra-info: You can track the request status in the “Transaction History” section.
cashbox-withdrawal-info: It will take some time to process a request. Usually it takes up to 24 hours for the finance department to review request during business hours. We are happy to report that we do not freeze your balance while you wait for the withdrawal request to be approved. That way, you can continue trading.
what-are-trends-advice-content: Trends are a special trading tool that allow you to quickly find an asset with profitable potential (with a pronounced price direction) and to open a trade in the direction of the trend.
not-enough-money-for-trends-detailed: A unique trading tool from Binarium is available for customers with a real balance over {{@balance}}. Promising opportunities:
trends-features-one: Track all asset trends on the market
trends-features-two: Instantly open trades in the direction of the trend when it appears
trading-room-is-empty: No signals available. Please check the Trading Room shortly.
demo-stats-banner-you-earned-on-demo: You've earned money in a demo account.
demo-stats-banner-real-account-opening-r: Open a real account, and you will be able to withdraw the income you earned
demo-stats-banner-keep-trading-on-demo: Continue trading with a demo account
tour-slide-0-caption: Welcome to the Binarium trading platform
tour-slide-0-content: This brief demonstration will introduce you to the basic principles of trading and the Binarium platform interface.
tour-slide-0-content-1: Read through all of the cards to learn how to trade more effectively on the platform.
tour-slide-0-content-2: This brief demonstration will introduce you to the basic principles of trading and the Binarium platform interface.
tour-slide-0-content-3: The main menu is on the left. For example, you can refill your account in the Bank section. And you can order trades using the best traders on the platform in the Trading room section!
tour-slide-0-content-3-port: В верхнем правом углу находится основное меню. Например, пополнить счет можно в пункте «Касса». А в «Торговой комнате» можно торговать с помощью лучших трейдеров платформы!
tour-slide-0-extra-info: Read through all of the cards to learn how to trade more effectively on the platform.
tour-slide-1-caption: How do you earn money on the platform?
tour-slide-1-content: The trading platform allows you to place trades by making short-term investments in financial assets: forex currency pairs, cryptocurrencies, commodities, and other financial instruments.
tour-slide-2-caption: What is the basic principle behind making a trade?
tour-slide-2-content-a: A trade is a prediction about how the price of a financial asset will change over a particular period of time. Investors make either long or short trades.
tour-slide-2-content-b: If your prediction turns out to be true, you will receive income. If you are wrong, then you will lose all of the funds that you have invested.
tour-slide-3-caption: How do you place trades on the Binarium platform?
tour-slide-3-content: Select an asset whose price trend you would like to predict.
tour-slide-4-caption: How do you place trades on the Binarium platform?
tour-slide-4-content: Select the size of your investment.
tour-slide-5-caption: How do you place trades on the Binarium platform?
tour-slide-5-content: Open a trade after you make a prediction that the price willincrease or decrease. Wait until the trade closes.
tour-slide-6-caption: Good luck trading on the Binarium platform
tour-slide-6-additional-caption: If your prediction was correct, your profit will be automatically credited to your trading account.
tour-slide-6-a-card-0-caption: The amount of income that you will receive from making a successful prediction:
tour-slide-6-a-card-0-content-2: of the amount of your investment you will receive from making a successful prediction.
tour-slide-6-a-card-2-caption: average time needed to withdraw funds:
tour-slide-6-a-card-3-caption: Deposit funds into a real account in order to start trading:
tour-slide-6-b-card-0-caption: The amount of income that you will receive from making a successful prediction:
tour-slide-6-b-card-0-content: Up to 90% of the amount of your investment.
tour-slide-6-b-card-2-caption: average time needed to withdraw funds.
tour-slide-6-b-card-3-caption: Learn how to trade without risk using a demo account
what-is-trading-room-advice-content: A trading room is a handy tool that allows you to copy the transactions of the best traders of the platform in one click. You can increase the efficiency of your trades and save time thanks to this tool.
not-enough-money-for-trading-room-detail: Trade and earn money with the best traders on the Binarium platform using the trading room. Top up your real balance to {{@minBalance}} and receive the following benefits:
have-access-to-trading-room: To get access to the “Trading Room”, contact your manager or the support service.
trading-room-features-one: Keep an eye out for transactions of the most successful trader of the platform
trading-room_1-text: Keep an eye out for transactions of the most successful trader of the platform.
trading-room_2-title: Take advantage of others' successful experience
trading-room_2-text: Copy the behavior of other traders and make a profit!
trading-room_refill: To access the "Trading room", refill your balance to

modal-confirm_text-2: Did you fail to receive a message with a confirmation link? Please check your "Spam" folder. Sometimes messages end up there. Or request the message again.
modal-confirm_error-1-1: A new e-mail can be sent to you in {{@time}} minutes. To activate your account, please check your email or contact our support service or

modal-nickname_text: To participate in the contest, enter the nickname that will represent you in the list of contest participants. You can change it at any time in your profile settings.

modal-profile_aside: The safety of your personal data is guaranteed.

srv-err_binary-is-disabled-for-this-tour: Asset is disabled for this tournament
srv-err_turbo-is-disabled-for-this-tourn: Asset is disabled for this tournament
faq@c0q0: Does the platform offer a demo account?
faq@c0a0:
Immediately after registration, you will receive a training account (demo account). This account is intended to be used for educational and training purposes. You will not be able to withdraw money from this account. You can perform trades in both your real and demo accounts at the same time by switching between them in the trading terminal.
In order to top up your demo account with funds, please sign out and log in again to your account on the platform.
faq@c0q1: How can I start working with Binarium?
faq@c0a1: If you are already familiar with the basics of working on the market and know how to trade binary options, then you just need to top up your account, and you can start trading. The minimum amount of deposit is 5$/5€/150₴ or 300 rubles. If you are not confident in your abilities, then practice with the demo account and be sure to check out our training materials.
faq@c0q2: Do I have to sign any documents before I start trading?
faq@c0a2: You do not need to sign anything. You agree to the customer agreement during registration.
faq@c0q3: Is there any restriction in working with some countries?
faq@c0a3: Customers of 2 countries can not use our services - it is USA and Israel. Customers from these countries will not be able to register on our site and start trading.
faq@c0q4: Do I need to download any specialized software in order to conduct trades?
faq@c0a4:
No. You execute trades exclusively through the web interface of the terminal on the binarium.com website. You can trade from any computer that is connected to the Internet. To do this, you must first register and then enter your username and password.
To trade on a smartphone, you need to download the Binarium app for Android.
faq@c0a5: This is a stock exchange tool that allows you to open a transaction for a rise or fall in the price of an asset. All risks and profits are known before the transaction is concluded. You can open two types of transactions on the platform - turbo (short-term transactions with expiration of no more than 5 minutes) and binary (middle and long-term positions with expiration from 5 minutes to 3 months).
faq@c0a6: The closing time is also called expiration time; it is the time at which the transaction closes. By transaction results, the trader either receives a payment which was agreed in advance or receives nothing. It all depends on whether traders' forecast has come true.
faq@c0a7: The closing price is the price of the asset at the time the position expires.
faq@c0q8: Under what conditions does the deal become profitable?
faq@c0a8: You make a profit in case your forecast came true. For example, you predicted that the price would increase (you've opened a CALL position) - in this case, the profit will be credited to the account if at the moment of the position expiration the asset price will be higher than when the deal was opened.
faq@c0q9: Can I order a callback from your support service?
faq@c0a9: Yes. Write a message requesting a call back to the e-mail address support@binarium.com or write to us in online chat. Usually support service staff will get back to you within one business hour.
faq@c1a0: Everything you need to do is to fill out a quick sign up form on the main page of the site.
faq@c1q1: Do I need to top up my account or make a deposit in order to register?
faq@c1a1: No, the registration is free. You will have to replenish your account only when you decide to start trading on a real account. Before this, you can train on a demo account.
faq@c1q2: What currency can be used for work?
faq@c1a2: You can choose 1 out of 4 available currencies during registration - dollar / euro / ruble / hryvnia. Note that you can not change the account currency, so make your choice deliberately.
faq@c1q3: What methods of account replenishment are available?
faq@c1a3: Binarium allows its customers to top up their accounts using bank cards (VISA/Mastercard/Mir), electronic payment systems (Kiwi, Yandex.Money, Neteller, WebMoney and AlfaClick) or cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Ripple).
faq@c1q4: How long does it take to replenish my account?
faq@c1a4: The account replenishes instantly. Once the funds are deposited into the Binarium account, they are immediately displayed on the trading platform and in your personal account.
faq@c1q5: I can't make a deposit, how can I solve this problem?
faq@c1a5: There can be many reasons for this. To understand your situation, please send a request to the customer support. You can do this either by submitting an application to support@binarium.com or by reporting a problem in the online chat.
faq@c1q6: How can I withdraw funds from my account?
faq@c1a6: You can withdraw funds to a bank card or to your account with the Qiwi, Yandex.Money, WebMoney, Neteller, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Ripple payment systems.
faq@c1q7: I can't create an application for withdrawal of funds from the account. What can be wrong?
faq@c1a7: First, check whether all of the personal information is listed on your profile, to check it go to the "Profile" section. Once again, make sure that you entered all the information correctly when submitting the application, the symbols like +, -, / etc are invalid. If all the information entered is correct, but the problem persists, please, contact customer support via online chat or at support@binarium.com.
faq@c1q8: Do I need to maintain an account type? If so, then how should I do this?
faq@c1a8:
Your account type will depend on the amount of all completed deposits and on the trading volume of real funds. Your assigned account type does not expire.
For more information about account types, see Account Types
faq@c2q0: What is the minimum deposit amount?
faq@c2a0: We have set a minimum deposit to 300 rubles or 5$/5€/150₴. You will not be able to make a deposit with a smaller amount of money.
faq@c2q1: Is there a limit on the maximum deposit?
faq@c2a1: We do not have such limit. However, there is an upper limit on the amount of one payment, within one transaction the customer can replenish the account by no more than 600 000 rubles / 10 000 $ / 10 000 € / 250 000₴. But you can make as much payments in row as you want.
faq@c2q2: What is the minimum amount of money that can be withdrawn from the account?
faq@c2a2: The minimum withdrawal amount is 300 rubles or 5 $ / 5 € / 150₴. The maximum amount of one transaction for withdrawal is 15 000 rubles or 250 $ / 250 € / 6000₴.
faq@c2q3: How can I withdraw more than 15 000 rubles or 250 $ / 250 € / 6000₴?
faq@c2a3: This limit is set for the possibility of making quick payments, because the amounts above can not be withdrawn so quickly. If you need to withdraw more, you can split the withdrawal of funds for payments of 15 000 rubles / 250 $ / 250 € / 6000 ₴. The number of requests for withdrawal depends on your account type. To withdraw a larger amount by one payment, please contact the company support
faq@c2q4: Is there a fee for replenishing/withdrawing cash from the account?
faq@c2a4:
We do not charge commissions, as well as fees for a payment. And we cover the fee of payment systems for our clients for depositing/withdrawing funds from the trading account.

However, if you have applied for a funds withdrawal, and your trading turnover (the sum of all your trades) did not exceed the deposit twice, we have the right not to cover the payment system fees for withdrawing funds in the amount of 10% of the requested withdrawal sum.
faq@c2q5: How is quick  withdrawal of funds?
faq@c2a5:
One hour is the amount of time that is required to process an application. This time is valid if the application is submitted during the business hours of the platform's financial department and your account has been verified according to the platform requirements.
The financial department's business hours are: 10:00 AM –10:00 PM (GMT +2), Monday to Friday. If an application to withdraw funds is submitted outside of the financial department’s business hours or on weekends, the application will be processed at the beginning of the next business day.
If your account is not verified, it may take up to 3 business days to process your application to withdraw funds. At the same time, you may not submit more than one application to withdraw funds per day.
faq@c2a6: For the filing and further processing of the application by the company, the client is should to fill all the requested data in the section Profile. If the data is incorrect or incomplete, the withdrawal of funds may be rejected or delayed. The company withdraw funds for the same requisites from which the account was replenished. If such a transaction is not possible, you need to contact technical support via an online chat or by sending a request to support@binarium.com.
faq@c2q7: Do I need to provide documents when I withdraw funds? If yes, which ones?
faq@c2a7:
In order to process quick withdrawals, please fill out all of your personal data in the "Profile Settings" section. If you use several credit cards or the payment details do not coincide with the ones that you provided during registration, you will need to undergo a full authorization procedure and prove that the cards really belong to you. You may not withdraw funds to a third-party account.

If you topped up your account using a VISA/Mastercard/Maestro bank card:

In order to complete the verification procedure, please send the following information to id@binarium.com:

  • Scans or high-quality photos of the front and back of the credit card. The following should be clearly visible from the scans:
    • The first 6 digits and last 4 digits of the card number, like in the example: 530403XXXXXX1111. You may cover the digits in the middle;
    • The first and last names of the card holder;
    • Card expiration date;
    • The back of the card must be signed;
    • The CVV code must be covered;
  • Scan or high-quality photo of the two-page spread of the passport of the card holder. All information should be clearly visible. Please do not hide or retouch any parts of the scans and photos of passport spreads.
  • An official bank statement that indicates the top-up transaction for your Binarium platform. Statements downloaded from your Internet banking mobile app are not accepted.

If you topped up your account using an electronic payment system (Qiwi, Webmoney, Yandex.Money, Alfa-bank, Neteller):

In order to complete the verification procedure, please send the following information to id@binarium.com:

  • Scan of the passport of the owner of the trading account. All information should be clearly visible and none of it should be covered.
  • Statement (screenshot) from the online payment system where the top-up transaction for the Binarium platform is visible. The document should display all transactions for the month in which the platform payment was made.
faq@c2q8: Why request for withdrawal confirmed, but on the card / e-wallet of funds not have yet?
faq@c2a8:
The time period for withdrawal of funds depends on the selected payment system.

  • In case of withdrawal to a bank card. The process of sending funds consists of several steps, and the time of receipt of funds depends on the bank in which your card is issued. Transfer of funds to a bank card may take up to several working days.
  • In the case of withdrawal to the e-wallet. The funds will be received on the e-wallet in an hour after confirmation of the request by the financial department.

There are various force majeure situations in which there may be delays in time period of funds (for example, technical problems in the processing center or failure of the e-wallet system). Please treat with understanding to such situations, as this is not the fault of the company.If funds didn’t received on your card / e-wallet within the specified time, please contact customer support for more details on the status of your withdrawal.
faq@c2a9:
A bonus is an absolute amount of money that the company credits to your account to increase your trading potential. The amount of the bonus depends on the sum of the account replenishment and account status.

We provide the following kinds of bonuses:

  • Welcome bonus - is only credited to new customers upon the first deposit;
  • Bonus for participating in various company events;
  • Insurance of transactions - reimbursement of losses for a limited number of transactions;
  • A bonus from the prize fund as part of any competition, the prize fund is distributed among the participants depending on the taken place.

The conditions for obtaining the bonus and its size are discussed in each particular case. The company might deprive you of the granted bonus at any time if you have violated any of the clauses of the client agreement.

When replenishing an account, you can refuse to enroll a bonus. If the replenishment had to be carried out in parts because of the limitations of payment systems, please contact support to get a full bonus.
faq@c2q10: What is a deposit insurance / transaction OR option insurance?
faq@c2a10:
The client may be provided with a limited number of insured transactions. The company undertakes to compensate losses for such transactions in case they happen.

There are several rules:

  • Only the first transactions/options are insured;
  • The value of one transaction can not be higher than 33% of the deposit;
  • The total insurance can not exceed the amount of the deposit.

If the trader received, for example, five insured transactions, and if after they have been closed the balance of the account is less than before the trade was conducted, the broker reimburses the difference. In this case, the funds credited as compensation are considered as bonus funds and they are subject to the same rules as the usual bonus.

If you did not violate the conditions under which the insurance is provided, then just contact support to get the compensation.
faq@c2q11: On what conditions is it possible to withdraw bonus funds?
faq@c2a11:
The bonus itself cannot be withdrawn immediately after it is credited. The broker credits these funds to you as a supplement to your deposit in order to increase your opportunities. Money that is earned using bonus funds is also considered to be part of the bonus and is available for withdrawal only after the required trade volume is reached. In order to withdraw the bonus, you need to achieve a trade volume in the account that is 40 times the amount of the accrued bonus. If you are granted a no deposit bonus, then the leverage increases 50 times, that is, the account trade volume must be equal to 50 times the amount of the bonus. The maximum withdrawal amount cannot exceed the amount of the credited no deposit bonus. Cash prizes that are earned from the company's free tournaments are bonus funds, which are available for withdrawal after making a 40-fold turn.

Example. When you replenish your account, you have accrued $150 as a bonus. According to the rules, the total value of open deals must be 40 x 150 = $6,000, after which the bonus funds can be withdrawn. This takes into account both profitable and unprofitable transactions. Transactions that are closed at the opening price are not counted. In addition, please note that the trading platform forbids the use of a double transaction (Martingale) strategy, and transactions that are made using this strategy are not taken into account when working out the bonus, and can also be canceled by the decision of the company. There are no restrictions on the withdrawal of profits.

If you are going to withdraw part of the deposit, then the bonus will be automatically deducted from your account.

When determining a bonus, an amount not exceeding 5% of the amount of actively received bonuses is taken into account when considering how much of a single transaction is counted towards the trading volume. For example, if you received a bonus of USD 100, then up to USD 5 per transaction is taken into account for determining the bonus. If you open a transaction for USD 20, then USD 5 will be calculated as part of the trading volume.

Any points that remain unclear can be clarified by the Binarium support service.
faq@c2a12:
When you top up using special promotional codes or offers, your account will be credited with a certain number of transactions, which you can open without risking your deposit (the number and amount of transactions are specified in the description of the offer or promotional code).

When you open a risk-free deal, funds are not deducted from your balance, all the profit is credited to your account as a bonus.

When you receive risk-free deals, your balance is debited for the amount equal to the total amount of deals and credited to your account as a bonus. For example, you added $100 to your account and received 3 risk-free deals for the amount of $10 each. In this case, $30 is debited from your actual balance and credited to your account as a bonus.

Terms for claiming bonuses for risk-free deals are similar to the terms applied to regular bonuses.
faq@c3q0: What is the maximum trade amount?
faq@c3a0: According to the rules, no more than 10,000$/10,000€/250,000₴/600,000 rubles can be invested in one transaction. But the number of such transactions is not limited.
faq@c3q1: What is the minimum trade amount?
faq@c3a1: The volume of the transaction can not be less than 1$/1€/25₴/60 rubles.
faq@c3q2: How do I make a trade?
faq@c3a2:
Choose an asset, the expiration period, and transaction size, and decide on the direction of movement of the price. If you think that the price of the asset will grow, then click the green arrow that is pointing upwards. If you think that the price will fall, click on the red button with the downward pointing arrow.
Please note that the Binarium platform prohibits any systematic use of a Martingale strategy for doubling transactions. Violation of this rule may lead to the cancellation of transactions and the freezing of your trading account.
faq@c3q3: Where is the history of the transactions displayed?
faq@c3a3: You can see the history of trades in your personal account (section "Trading History") and via the trading platform - in the "History" section.
faq@c3a4: If the forecast came true, then the profit reaches 90% of the transaction.
faq@c3q5: How can I monitor my opened transactions?
faq@c3a5: Transactions are displayed on the asset chart itself. You can work with 4 different graphs simultaneously.
faq@c3q6: At what time trading is available on Binarium platform?
faq@c3a6: Trading on all assets is possible from Monday to Friday. You can trade only cryptocurrency, LATAM and GSMI indices, as well as OTC assets on weekends.
faq@c3q7: Where can I find the trading hours for each of the assets?
faq@c3a7: Trading hours can be found in the "Asset catalog" section.
faq@c3a8: Yes, Binarium provides training for beginners, free information is provided in the "Education" section. There is individual training available with one of the company's analysts. If you need personal training, you have to discuss the details in a online chat or by phone.
faq@c3a9:
All information you see in the history of transactions is stored in the broker's system. It contains the exact price of the asset at the time of closing and opening the transaction, the name of the asset, the opening/closing time of the transaction to within a second.

If the trader has any doubts, the broker will send a request to the quotation provider regarding the reconciliation of quotations. In this case, the verification process lasts no less than 3 days from the date of the application. The client receives the verification results immediately after they are received by the Binarium.
faq@c3q10: Why quotes do not coincide with FOREX-quotations and other sources?
faq@c3a10:
The reasons for such variance are:

  • Forex displays the price of Bid and Ask, while Binarium displays the average price, which is calculated by the formula (Bid+Ask)/2;
  • Quotations come from different sources, they may vary slightly;
  • A small difference in the time of receipt of quotations may cause a difference in quotes (exactly - 4th-5th digit after comma).

By registering you agree that it is the quotes from Binarium that are of primary importance. They may not coincide with quotations from other resources. Third-party resources can not be used to reconcile quotations, they can be used only as an auxiliary tool.

modal-bonus@info: All funds received as part of the trade will be credited to your bonus account.

tr-empty@business: The trading room is open for traders with Business accounts and above. Two 4-hour trading sessions on weekdays. Around 30 signals from professional traders every day. Don't waste your time learning things on your own — Binarium's best traders have already done the work for you.
tr-empty@vip: Our VIP clients get all the privileges of the trading room, including personal signals and individual cooperation with a company trader who will answer all your questions, explain the current market trends and suggest areas with the highest potential. This is the best way to earn the most trading.
